channel.title: Comments on: Kanye West Is Out of His Mind

item.title: By: ajw
item.dc:creator: ajw
item.description: I can't help but think of Chuck Klosterman's anti-Coldplay rant in Sex, Drugs and Cocoa Puffs. I completely lost it once in front of a group of students because I read that passage aloud and starting laughing so hard. ("This is Emo" was in an anthology I used.)
item.content:encoded: I can’t help but think of Chuck Klosterman’s anti-Coldplay rant in Sex, Drugs and Cocoa Puffs. I completely lost it once in front of a group of students because I read that passage aloud and starting laughing so hard. (“This is Emo” was in an anthology I used.)
